price: Napunite mjeru kad mjerite na litru i pravo mjerite na kantaru! To je bolje i posljedice su ljepše.
arabic: وَأَوۡفُواْ ٱلۡكَيۡلَ إِذَا كِلۡتُمۡ وَزِنُواْ بِٱلۡقِسۡطَاسِ ٱلۡمُسۡتَقِيمِۚ ذَٰلِكَ خَيۡرٞ وَأَحۡسَنُ تَأۡوِيلٗا

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wa-awfū al-kayla idhā kil'tum wazinū bil-qis'ṭāsi al-mus'taqīmi dhālika khayrun wa-aḥsanu tawīlan
